Title: Trapped in a Duel to the Death!
Actors: Kappei Yamaguchi, Satsuki Yukino, Kumiko Watanabe
Plot: While Inuyasha's gang follows a demon bear with a jewel shard, Koga meets with some demons from the northern pack who tell him about their plan to storm a castle where a man has many jewel shards. When the chase leads Inuyasha and...
